_comment_version: Copy this file to sharkoder.config.json and customize for your setup

ffmpeg._comment_gpu: GPU Settings - NVIDIA NVENC Hardware Acceleration
ffmpeg._gpu_limit_info: GPU usage limit in % (0-100, 100 = max usage, lower values reduce GPU load)
ffmpeg._comment_cpu: CPU Settings (x265 fallback when GPU unavailable)
ffmpeg._cpu_preset_options: ultrafast, superfast, veryfast, faster, fast, medium, slow, slower, veryslow
ffmpeg._audio_bitrate_info: In kbps, only used if audio_codec is not 'copy'
ffmpeg._two_pass_info: Two-pass encoding for better bitrate allocation (CPU only)
ffmpeg._profile_options: main (8-bit), main10 (10-bit, recommended for better color)

remote._transfer_methods: auto (try WebDAV first, fallback to SFTP), webdav, sftp
remote._extract_duration_info: Extract video duration during statistics (slower, requires partial downloads)

sftp._password_alt: Or use SSH key authentication (not yet implemented)

webdav._url_info: Include http:// or https:// in URL

storage._local_temp_info: Temporary storage for downloads and encoding (needs 3x video size free)
storage._local_backup_info: Local backups of original and encoded files for comparison
storage._download_path_info: Where files are downloaded when using the download button
storage._mpv_path_info: Path to MPV player executable (leave as 'mpv' if in PATH, or full path like 'C:\Program Files\mpv\mpv.exe')

connection._max_prefetch_range: 1-10, files to download ahead of queue
connection._retry_range: 1-10, number of retry attempts on failure

cleanup._cleanup_jobs_info: Days to keep completed/failed jobs in database

behavior._auto_start_info: Automatically start queue on app launch
behavior._create_backups_info: Create local backups of original files
behavior._server_backups_info: Keep backup of original on server
behavior._keep_encoded_info: Keep local copy of encoded file after upload
behavior._keep_original_info: Keep local backup of original file
behavior._simulation_info: Skip encoding (just copy files) for testing pipeline

ui._hide_empty_info: Hide folders with no video files
ui._theme_options: dark, light (light theme not yet implemented)

notification_settings._tray_info: Minimize to system tray instead of taskbar
